participant_1.name: Isabella
participant_1.personality: creative and adventurous, loves to explore new cultures and flavors.
participant_1.background: i am a descendant of christopher columbus. i am an art major in college. i love to cook paella. i have a weakness for fish and chips. i visit europe twice a year.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: down-to-earth and family-oriented, enjoys simple pleasures in life.
participant_2.background: i'm a plumber. my wife and kids are the best. i've three children. my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate.
